message.content:
cs.DC, cs.DB, cs.SE, cs.Distributed, cs.PL 

The paper describes the development of R-GMA, a Grid Information and Monitoring System, which is being developed within the European DataGrid Project. The system is based on the GMA from GGF, which is a simple Consumer-Producer model. The paper discusses the use of relational databases and APIs for monitoring and information services, which suggests a focus on distributed computing (cs.DC) and databases (cs.DB). The paper also mentions application monitoring and the use of scripts, which suggests a focus on software engineering (cs.SE) and programming languages (cs.PL). Finally, the paper discusses the deployment of R-GMA in Grid testbeds, which suggests a focus on distributed systems (cs.Distributed).
